original_text:
Lift up your heads, O gates!
    And be lifted up, O ancient doors,
    that the King of glory may come in.
korean_text: 문들아 너희 머리를 들지어다 영원한 문들아 들릴지어다 영광의 왕이 들어가시리로다

sentences.original_text: Lift up your heads, O gates!
And be lifted up, O ancient doors,
that the King of glory may come in.
